availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert H. Courtney (Jefferson County, Kentucky, bank teller & notary)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, bank teller and notary public. Kentucky native. Son of Robert H. Courtney and Mary Naomi Ferguson Courtney. Teller for the Southern Bank of Kentucky in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned four enslaved persons in Jefferson County in 1850. Household owned six enslaved persons in Jefferson County in 1860. Teller of the Southern Bank of Kentucky in Louisville from 1860 through 1862. Appointed as a notary public on November 11, 1862. Bank teller in Jefferson County in 1863.
